casebody.data:
John C. MIDDLETON, petitioner,
v.
MISSOURI. No. 14-5238 14A52. Supreme Court of the United States July 15, 2014.

Opinion

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Missouri denied.

Justice SCALIAtook no part in the consideration or decision of application and this petition.
